channel.title: Login Problem (Narrowed it down)
channel.description:
Okay, as some of you will remember I posted a few days ago saying I was having trouble logging in. Recap for those that dont; After I click login it will just stay on the login screen but it says I have logged in on the server, I have narrowed it down to the character file, anyone know what is freezing my server?
[code][ACCOUNT] character-username = ok character-password = ok
[CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 3253 character-posy = 3420 character-rights = 2 character-ismember = 1 character-messages = 0 character-lastconnection = localhost character-lastlogin = 20070977 character-energy = 9999 character-gametime = 0 character-gamecount = 23618
[EQUIPMENT] character-equip = 0 2643 1 character-equip = 1 6570 5 character-equip = 2 6585 1 character-equip = 3 4151 1 character-equip = 4 3140 1 character-equip = 5 4225 1 character-equip = 6 1 0 character-equip = 7 4087 1 character-equip = 8 1 0 character-equip = 9 6629 6 character-equip = 10 6619 12 character-equip = 11 1 0 character-equip = 12 6731 1 character-equip = 13 1 0
[LOOK] character-look = 0 0 character-look = 1 5 character-look = 2 1 character-look = 3 2 character-look = 4 0 character-look = 5 2
[SKILLS] character-skill = 0 99 14000000 character-skill = 1 99 14000000 character-skill = 2 99 14000000 character-skill = 3 99 14000000 character-skill = 4 99 14000000 character-skill = 5 99 14000000 character-skill = 6 99 14000000 character-skill = 7 99 14000000 character-skill = 8 99 14000000 character-skill = 9 99 14000000 character-skill = 10 99 14000000 character-skill = 11 99 14000000 character-skill = 12 99 14000000 character-skill = 13 99 14000000 character-skill = 14 99 14000000 character-skill = 15 99 14000000 character-skill = 16 99 14000000 character-skill = 17 99 14000000 character-skill = 18 99 14000000 character-skill = 19 99 14000000 character-skill = 20 99 14000000 character-skill = 21 99 14000000 character-skill = 22 99 14000000 character-skill = 23 99 14000000 character-skill = 24 99 14000000 character-skill = 25 99 14000000 character-skill = 26 99 14000000 character-skill = 27 99 14000000 character-skill = 28 99 14000000 character-skill = 29 99 14000000
[ITEMS] character-item = 0 2644 1 character-item = 1 3841 1 character-item = 2 1042 1 character-item = 3 1044 1 character-item = 4 1046 1 character-item = 5 1048 2 character-item = 6 4152 1 character-item = 7 6586 1 character-item = 8 1049 1 character-item = 9 1050 1 character-item = 10 1052 1 character-item = 11 1056 1 character-item = 12 1054 1 character-item = 13 1049 1 character-item = 14 6571 2 character-item = 15 6732 1
[BANK] character-bank = 0 774 65 character-bank = 1 963 11 character-bank = 2 1051 9 character-bank = 3 1041 22 character-bank = 4 1039 22 character-bank = 5 1047 25 character-bank = 6 1043 16 character-bank = 7 1045 21 character-bank = 8 1049 12 character-bank = 9 557 210000 character-bank = 10 380 399 character-bank = 11 386 399 character-bank = 12 374 399 character-bank = 13 398 399 character-bank = 14 392 100147 character-bank = 15 996 214700 character-bank = 16 567 210000 character-bank = 17 566 210000 character-bank = 18 562 210000 character-bank = 19 558 210000 character-bank = 20 555 210000 character-bank = 21 556 210000 character-bank = 22 559 210000 character-bank = 23 563 210000 character-bank = 24 564 210000 character-bank = 25 565 210000 character-bank = 26 561 210000 character-bank = 27 560 210000 character-bank = 28 1058 10 character-bank = 29 1054 9 character-bank = 30 1056 9 character-bank = 31 4088 9 character-bank = 32 1150 8 character-bank = 33 3141 9 character-bank = 34 4586 5 character-bank = 35 4588 5 character-bank = 36 2573 2 character-bank = 37 1713 1 character-bank = 38 6586 7 character-bank = 39 158 2 character-bank = 40 6569 2 character-bank = 41 6571 210000 character-bank = 42 4676 1 character-bank = 43 6525 3 character-bank = 44 778 1 character-bank = 45 2578 1 character-bank = 46 7159 1 character-bank = 47 3843 1 character-bank = 48 6732 3 character-bank = 49 4152 10

I greatly appreciate all replies!

item.title: Login Problem (Narrowed it down)
item.dc:creator: @x0x0 x0x0
item.description:
@x0x0 wrote:

alirght ill give it a try

worked, could this have happened because I had too many bank spots? JW on how to prevent it in the future.

Read full topic

item.title: Login Problem (Narrowed it down)
item.dc:creator: @Wildfire Wildfire
item.description:
@Wildfire wrote:

Clear all of the items. Since you are obviously admin, you can get important stuff back.

Read full topic

item.title: Login Problem (Narrowed it down)
item.dc:creator: @x0x0 x0x0
item.description:
@x0x0 wrote:

Did you even read the post?

I cant login with my admin account because of something in that file.
